subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi scored two late goals to give F.C. Barcelona a 2-1 victory at Shakhtar Donestsk in the Champions League. A.S. Roma rallied for a 3-1 victory at Bordeaux. Things went more smoothly for Liverpool, which defeated P.S.V. Eindhoven by 3-1, and Atlético Madrid, which beat Marseille, 2-1. Chelsea played to a 0-0 draw at unheralded C.F.R. Cluj in another of the day’s eight group matches.
